p: The expression level of CHKVmab was measured by an ELISA that detected the fully assembled form of mAbs with both HC and LC (Lai et al., 2010). Briefly, plates were coated with an anti‐human gamma HC antibody (Southern Biotech) and incubated with the plant protein extract. After washing, a HRP‐conjugated anti‐human kappa LC antibody (Southern Biotech) was used for detection. A plant‐produced mAb with human IgG1 CH and kappa CL (E16) (Lai et al., 2010) was used as a reference standard.
